events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I did not get what I ordered.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back after receiving an incorrect product.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's refund case promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll assist you with the refund process right away.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify this for you?
Sure, my order number is 12345ABCD. I have attached a photo showing the item I got and it is definitely not what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund immediately, and you do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for your quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate that I don't need to send the item back.
The refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to ensure your refund was received and that everything is satisfactory with our resolution.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
